thread.title: Philippines Bans Foreign Research Ships, Reversing China Deal

author: Jake Maxwell Watts
title: Philippines Bans Foreign Research Ships, Reversing China Deal
text:
The Philippines said it was suspending joint exploration of undersea resources and would chase off foreign ships conducting research in its territorial waters, after an agreement to allow a Chinese vessel to survey an undersea plateau there triggered a nationalist backlash against President Rodrigo Duterte.
The change of tack follows a surge of nationalism in the Philippines in response to a cooperation agreement last month with China to survey an area of the Philippine Sea called Benham Rise, off the countryâ€™s northeast coast.
